name: 3D Shooter (IHATESpencer)
description:
Introduction：

Level 1, the player is born from the Mainroom base, and needs to get out of the base split-level. By the player will come to a maze, the player needs to find the exit to enter the second level.

In the second level, the player is born in a valley, an abandoned space station base, and the player needs to defeat the boss and boss minion.

In the final level, the player reaches the most important station, which is overrun and parasitic by the Zerg. It contains a large number of Zerg nests, where the Zerg can breed. The player needs to find the key, unlock the door of each station, and finally reach the end.

Description：

I split the game into three levels, where the player had to be flexible with more powerful weapons than pistols, because there would be a lot of enemies, but also plenty of ammo. I didn't change the gun model because I don't know how to use  3D Maya for animation.
